page.title: 13GENERAL FASHION.
page.content: FASHION FOR CLOTHES CHANGES THROUGHOUT THE YEARS.THIS YEAR THE FASHIONABLE COLOURS ARE BLACK,RED,AND BRIGHT COLOURS.THE CRAZE TODAY IS ROCK-AND-ROLL AND MODS. ROCK-AND-ROLL FOR GIRLS IS A BLACK SKIRT WITH FRILLS,AND A GREEN T-SHIRT;FOR BOYS IT IS JEANS,AND LEATHER OR JEANS JACKETS.THERE IS A POP-SINGER THAT HAS A STRANGE TYPE OF CLOTHING.IN ONE OF HIS SONGS HE WORE AN AMERICAN FOOTBALL SHIRT.THE NORMAL STYLE OF CLOTHING FOR THE SUMMER IS - FOR GIRLS SHORTS AND A T-SHIRTS,OR A SUNDRESS - FOR BOYS T-SHIRTS AND SHORTS.IN WINTER BOYS WEAR JEANS,THICK JUMPERS AND SHIRTS.GIRLS WEAR MORE OR LESS THE SAME AS BOYS.
